history.proof: intros t. induction t. - simpl. apply cover_one. - simpl. qauto use: cover_app, map_app.

original: intros t. induction t. - simpl. unfold all_leaves. simpl. apply cover_one. - simpl. unfold all_leaves. simpl. intros. apply cover_node with (l1:= all_leaves t1) (l2:= all_leaves t2). + apply permutation_map. apply cover_permutation with (t:= leaf a) (l1:= (all_leaves t1 ++ all_leaves t2)). * apply IHt1. * unfold all_leaves. apply cover_one. + apply IHt2.
